all the five datasets.from sentence:
Results
Large data results
On all the five datasets , DPCNN outperforms all of the previous results , which validates the effectiveness of our approach .

DPCNN performances.from sentence:
Small data results
For these small datasets , the DPCNN performances with 100 - dim unsupervised embed - dings are shown , which turned out to be as good as those with 300 - dim unsupervised embeddings .

ShallowCNN.from sentence: ShallowCNN ( row 2 ) rivals DPCNN ( row 1 ) , and Zhang et al. 's best linear model ( row 3 ) moved up from the worst performer to the third best performer .
